text: U-Carmen e-Khayelitsha is a 2005 South African musical movie directed by Mark Dornford-May and was based on the 1875 operetta Carmen. It stars Pauline Malefane, Andile Tshoni, Lungelwa Blou. ==Other websites== * Category:2005 musical movies Category:South African movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in South Africa Category:Movies directed by Mark Dornford- May
title: U-Carmen e-Khayelitsha
